Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a rich history and unparalleled value, making it an exceptional addition to any collection or endeavor. I am extending to you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1200000. This offer represents an exclusive chance to own a piece that is not only worth its weight in gold but also holds immense sentimental and historical significance. I look forward to discussing the details with you and welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
